channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLmoneyAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLmoneyAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I’ve always lived hand-to-mouth’: I’m 64. My father left me $400K from his 457(b) plan. My brother is suing me. How can I defend myself?
item.description: “I live off my Social Security of $900 a month.”

item.title: ‘We almost lost $10,000’: My late father-in-law’s company claimed his life-insurance policy didn’t exist. It did.
item.description: “The company changed names several times, and it was very difficult tracking them down for payment of benefits.”

item.title: ‘My retirement is completely in bitcoin’: Why don’t more people do what I do?
item.description: “‘I also borrow against bitcoin. What’s the catch?”

item.title: ‘There’s a lot of tension’: My brother and I manage a $5 million trust. How do we solve our many disagreements?
item.description: “We have a good estate attorney, but he just repeats the facts; we need someone to help with the feelings.”

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.
